name: Date Masamune (02/12)
description: Date Masamune, the master of tactics who fought on the side of Oda Nobunaga during the Sengoku era is called the One-Eyed Dragon due to a defect in one of his eyes. The smallpox he contracted when he was young caused him to lose one of his eyes. He was a respected figure in his time and was the one who founded the city of Sendai.
